definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Someone tried to poison the water supply.
sentences.chinese: 有人企圖在供水系統裏放毒。

sentences.english: In nearby Indore the ration is half an hour's supply every seven days.
sentences.chinese: 在鄰近的印多爾則每7天才有一次半小時的供水。

sentences.english: Leakage of water distribution systems is a serious problem in water industries.
sentences.chinese: 給水管網漏損是供水行業普遍存在的題目。

sentences.english: Our water supply has been cut off again.
On the other, it’s becoming so expensive to obtain and supply that most governments cannot afford to shoulder the cost alone.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，找水和供水的代價政府無力一人承擔。

sentences.english: Citect has vast experience throughout the world in the Water and Wastewater Industry.
sentences.chinese: 悉雅特在全球的供水和廢水處理行業有豐富的經驗。

sentences.english: All the water-supply enterprises are faced with the same topic of controlling of leak water .
sentences.chinese: 漏損控制是所有供水企業面臨的共同課題。

sentences.english: Poisoning London's water supplies was a "weak idea".
sentences.chinese: 在倫敦的供水中投毒是一個“軟弱的想法”。

sentences.english: China will continue to carry out well-drilling and water supply projects in Africa to provide safe drinking water for the African people.
sentences.chinese: 繼續援助打井供水項目，爲民衆提供安全飲用水。

sentences.english: The gravity feed batch solar heater is very simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 重力供水太陽能熱水器的操作方法很簡單。

sentences.english: For example, Metro Manila's water supply is now managed by two private sector concessionaires .
sentences.chinese: 例如，馬尼拉供水目前所管理的兩個私營部門的特許。

sentences.english: These are the three recycling pumps which supply water to reactor cooling system.
sentences.chinese: 這是三個循環泵的供水水反應堆冷卻系統。

sentences.english: As such, fluoride is added to the water supply of communities.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人們在社區供水中添加了氟化物。

sentences.english: Water supplies in the southeastern city of Gimhae were cut off Sunday after pipes burst.
sentences.chinese: 韓國東南部的金海市週日發生水管凍裂，供水被切斷。

sentences.english: Production and management of the company is a professional company of various water supplies.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是生產經營各種供水物資的專業公司。

sentences.english: Lincoln and Bellick go to the water station to cut off the main conduit water.
sentences.chinese: 林肯和巴利克來到了水站，斷開了主輸水管道的供水。

definition: to repair in a rush/rush repairs
to have running water (in a house etc)
